#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int a,b;

    while(1)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;

        if(a==0 && b==0)
            break;

        else
            {
                long long int x = 1;
                long long int y = 2;
                long long int temp;
                long long int count = 0;

                while(1)
                {
                    temp=x+y;
                    x=y;
                    y=temp;

                    if(temp>=a && temp<=b)
                        count++;
                    if(temp>=b)
                        break;
                }

                cout<<count<<endl;
            }
    }
}
